channel.title: Potions & Prayer drain rate?
channel.description: Hello people, I'm having a little problem. I'm using Project Czar btw. Okay, well, I just added potions like super strength, def, etc. When I drink the potions, like for strength it goes to 120/100, but it only drains the level when I logout, not while I'm in game. Same goes with prayer, it only drains when I logout and in, not when i exactly use prayer.So, I want it to be that when I drink the potion or put on a prayer, it drains the level while I'm online. This might be kindof confusing, but hopefully some people will understand. :P

item.title: Potions & Prayer drain rate?
item.dc:creator: @try_again try again
item.description:
@try_again wrote:

no point in this due to strength levels not mattering on project czar

Read full topic

item.title: Potions & Prayer drain rate?
item.dc:creator: @k1ngj4m3z k1ngj4m3z
item.description:
@k1ngj4m3z wrote:

Hello people, I’m having a little problem. I’m using Project Czar btw. Okay, well, I just added potions like super strength, def, etc. When I drink the potions, like for strength it goes to 120/100, but it only drains the level when I logout, not while I’m in game. Same goes with prayer, it only drains when I logout and in, not when i exactly use prayer.So, I want it to be that when I drink the potion or put on a prayer, it drains the level while I’m online. This might be kindof confusing, but hopefully some people will understand.
